front.title: IEEE Approved Draft Guide for the Application of Surge-Protective Components in Surge Protective Devices and Equipment Ports

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Surge protective components (SPCs) used in power and telecom surge protective devices (SPDs) and equipment ports are covered in the IEEE C62.42 guide series. The following are covered in this part of the series on high-frequency signal isolation-transformer technology SPCs: component construction, characteristics, and ratings.
